description: DICOM to NIfTI converter optimized for AFNI

adjacent_dicoms.title: Adjacent DICOMs
adjacent_dicoms.description: Adjacent DICOMs (images from same series always in same folder) for faster conversion (n/y, default n)

bids_sidecar.title: BIDS Sidecar
bids_sidecar.description: BIDS sidecar (y/n/o [o=only: no NIfTI], default y)

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Comment stored in NIfTI aux_file (provide up to 24 characters e.g. '-c first_visit')

directory_search_depth.title: Directory Search Depth
directory_search_depth.description: Directory search depth. Convert DICOMs in sub-folders of in_folder? (0..9, default 5)

export_format.title: Export Format
export_format.description: Export as NRRD (y) or MGH (o) instead of NIfTI (y/n/o, default n)

generate_defaults.title: Generate Defaults
generate_defaults.description: Generate defaults file (y/n/o/i [o=only: reset and write defaults; i=ignore: reset defaults], default n)

ignore_images.title: Ignore Images
ignore_images.description: Ignore derived, localizer and 2D images (y/n, default n)

lossless_scale.title: Lossless Scale
lossless_scale.description: Losslessly scale 16-bit integers to use dynamic range (y/n/o, default o)

merge_slices.title: Merge Slices
merge_slices.description: Merge 2D slices from same series regardless of echo, exposure, etc. (n/y or 0/1/2, default 2)

series_crc_number.title: Series CRC Number
series_crc_number.description: Only convert this series CRC number - can be used up to 16 times (default convert all)

output_directory.title: Output Directory
output_directory.description: Output directory (omit to save to input folder)

phillips_scaling.title: Phillips Scaling
phillips_scaling.description: Philips precise float (not display) scaling (y/n, default y)

rename_dicoms.title: Rename DICOMs
rename_dicoms.description: Rename instead of convert DICOMs (y/n, default n)

single_file_mode.title: Single File Mode
single_file_mode.description: Single file mode, do not convert other images in folder (y/n, default n)

write_behavior.title: Write Behavior
write_behavior.description: Write behavior for name conflicts (0=skip duplicates, 1=overwrite, 2=add suffix)

crop_3d.title: Crop 3D
crop_3d.description: Crop 3D acquisitions (y/n/i, default n, use 'i'gnore to neither crop nor rotate 3D acquisitions)

gz_compress.title: GZ Compress
gz_compress.description: GZ compress images (y/o/i/n/3, default n) [y=pigz, o=optimal pigz, i=internal:miniz, n=no, 3=no,3D]

big_endian.title: Big Endian
big_endian.description: Byte order (y/n/o, default o) [y=big-endian, n=little-endian, o=optimal/native]

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Slicer format progress information (y/n, default n)
